Microsoft.Xna.Framework

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameWindow

  • public abstract class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The system window associated with a Game.
    Author:
    Halofreak1990

      • BeginScreenDeviceChange

        public abstract void BeginScreenDeviceChange(boolean willBeFullScreen)
        Starts a device transition (windowed to full screen or vice versa).
        Parameters:
        willBeFullScreen - Specifies whether the device will be in full-screen mode upon completion of the change.

      • EndScreenDeviceChange

        public void EndScreenDeviceChange(java.lang.String screenDeviceName)
        Completes a device transition.
        Parameters:
        screenDeviceName - The desktop screen to move the window to. This should be the screen device name of the graphics device that has transitioned to full screen.

      • EndScreenDeviceChange

        public abstract void EndScreenDeviceChange(java.lang.String screenDeviceName,
                         int clientWidth,
                         int clientHeight)
        Completes a device transition.
        Parameters:
        screenDeviceName - The desktop screen to move the window to. This should be the screen device name of the graphics device that has transitioned to full screen.
        clientWidth - The new width of the game's client window.
        clientHeight - The new height of the game's client window.
